name: tiny-mushroom
short_effect: Fire Red and Leaf Green: Trade two for prior Level-up moves. Sell for 250 Pokédollars, or to Hungry Maid for 500 Pokédollars.

flavor_text.black_white: A small and rare mushroom. It is sought after by collectors.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: A small and rare mushroom. It is sought after by collectors.
